attributes.action: Stop the use of vaccine passports
attributes.additional_details: Covid passes will make hospitality sectors like nightclubs suffer even further and many more business will go banckruped due to these restrictions. Many business have not even started to recover from previous restrictions and lockdowns and they have been hit the hardest again.
attributes.background: Stop the use of vaccine passports.The vaccine passports dicriminate the people that do not want to take the vaccine for personal reasons or free right of choice. People that do not want to get the vaccine will not do so no matter what.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not require Covid vaccination passports for crowded events: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592671

Do not require a Covid passport for access to any services, jobs or events: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593122

Outlaw discrimination on the basis of vaccination status: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596004
